links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""For starters, you're wearing *the..."
links.text: "For starters, you're wearing *the exact same* outfit I first met you in..." He holds his nose.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Have you even *smelled* that jacke..."
links.text: "Have you even *smelled* that jacket? It's like some wretched night-wandering creature died in it."

links.title: Perception (Smell): "You have developed a bit of a *rind..."
links.text: You have developed a bit of a *rind* over the past few days.

links.title: Composure: "The lieutenant's right. You're the..."
links.text: The lieutenant's right. You're the acrid sweet smell of decay that makes people evacuate the room.

links.title: You: ""It's disco, Kim.""
links.text: "It's disco, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If by 'disco' you mean 'ungainly a..."
links.text: "If by 'disco' you mean 'ungainly and sad,' then yes, it's *extremely* disco."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, maybe I should let these thr..."
links.text: "Yeah, maybe I should let these threads air out a little bit."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It would be better if you let them..."
links.text: "It would be better if you let them air out in the trash, where they belong..."

links.title: Composure: "Somehow you thought you were *conce..."
links.text: Somehow you thought you were *concealing* it, but now you know that *everybody* has noticed.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Seeing you on the verge of tears, t..."
links.text: Seeing you on the verge of tears, the lieutenant realizes he was maybe overly direct vis-a-vis your sartorial situation...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now, now, no need to despair, dete..."
links.text: "Now, now, no need to despair, detective. You know the expression 'The clothes make the man'? We just need to find you a *new style*. That jacket you just acquired is a decent start."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, all that FALN gear makes you..."
links.text: "Well, all that FALN gear makes you look like a bicycle courier. All you're missing is the shirt."

links.title: Composure: "The lieutenant's right. It gives yo..."
links.text: The lieutenant's right. It gives you all the *panache* of a bicycle courier, daredevil and commander of the city streets!

links.title: You: ""What happens when I find the shirt?""
links.text: "What happens when I find the shirt?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Who knows?" The lieutenant shrugs...."
links.text: "Who knows?" The lieutenant shrugs. "Perhaps something *miraculous*."

links.title: You: ""Really? You think so?""
links.text: "Really? You think so?"

links.title: You: ""That's not quite what I was going..."
links.text: "That's not quite what I was going for."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then maybe you should change your..."
links.text: "Then maybe you should change your look..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know the expression 'The cloth..."
links.text: "You know the expression 'The clothes make the man'? The right outfit, in the right situation, can make all the difference in the world."

links.title: You: ""Okay." (Nod.) "You're a sharp dres..."
links.text: "Okay." (Nod.) "You're a sharp dressed man. We could be style buddies."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's not get ahead of ourselves,..."
links.text: "Let's not get ahead of ourselves, detective..."

links.title: Empathy: "A warm smile."
links.text: A warm smile.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Anyway, we should probably get bac..."
links.text: "Anyway, we should probably get back to the case. Let's go."

links.title: You: ""I'm not taking 'style' tips from s..."
links.text: "I'm not taking 'style' tips from someone who dresses like a mega-binoclard."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. And this 'mega-binoclard' kno..."
links.text: "Yes. And this 'mega-binoclard' knows how to sew a lapel and center a back vent." The lieutenant raises one eyebrow at you.

links.title: Composure: "That's why his clothes fit so well...."
links.text: That's why his clothes fit so well...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So if you want to wake up next to..."
links.text: "So if you want to wake up next to anyone other than *Commodore Red*, you might do well to take notes."

links.title: You: ""I'm not taking 'style' tips from s..."
links.text: "I'm not taking 'style' tips from someone who dresses like a washed-up TipTop racer."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This 'washed-up TipTop racer' know..."
links.text: "This 'washed-up TipTop racer' knows how to sew a lapel and center a back vent." The lieutenant raises one eyebrow at you.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""To be perfectly blunt, you're dres..."
links.text: "To be perfectly blunt, you're dressed like a blood-hungry mercenary."

links.title: Endurance: "That's right. You're protected in y..."
links.text: That's right. You're protected in your ceramic carapace. Whatever harm you inflict on that world won't be visited on you.

links.title: You: ""I'm wearing it in case we get into..."
links.text: "I'm wearing it in case we get into a firefight."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "It might fee..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs. "It might feel good to play *super-merc*, but you might want to ask if it's actually helping you solve the case..."

links.title: You: ""That's not quite what I was going..."
links.text: "That's not quite what I was going for."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then maybe you should change your..."
links.text: "Then maybe you should change your look..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's just, well, you look more lik..."
links.text: "It's just, well, you look more like a high-flying businessman than a police officer."

links.title: Composure: "That's right -- You're an entrepren..."
links.text: That's right -- You're an entrepreneur of the peace, here to disrupt legacy law enforcement with buzzwords and privatization schemes.

links.title: You: ""Well, yeah. You never know when yo..."
links.text: "Well, yeah. You never know when you're going to need to pitch a business proposal."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, god. Don't start *talking* lik..."
links.text: "Oh, god. Don't start *talking* like those people, too..."

links.title: You: ""Oh, I just thought that this was h..."
links.text: "Oh, I just thought that this was how professional people were supposed to dress."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's nothing *wrong* with it, p..."
links.text: "There's nothing *wrong* with it, per se. It's just... a little much..."

links.title: You: ""That's not quite what I was going..."
links.text: "That's not quite what I was going for."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then maybe you should change your..."
links.text: "Then maybe you should change your look..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""For starters, you're dressed like..."
links.text: "For starters, you're dressed like an old fascist. Is that really appropriate?"

links.title: Authority: "You're wearing the vestments of *or..."
links.text: You're wearing the vestments of *order* and *hierarchy*. You have nothing to answer for.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Except all the war crimes the peopl..."
links.text: Except all the war crimes the people in those vestments perpetrated, but what's a few atrocities here and there if you *look cool* doing it?

links.title: You: ""Well, yeah, I want everyone to kno..."
links.text: "Well, yeah, I want everyone to know I'm here to defend traditional values and stomp communards."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "Is that real..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs. "Is that really the impression you want to give people?"

links.title: You: ""I don't care about their politics,..."
links.text: "I don't care about their politics, it just *looks* cool."

links.title: You: ""That's not quite what I was going..."
links.text: "That's not quite what I was going for."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then maybe you should change your..."
links.text: "Then maybe you should change your look..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""To be perfectly blunt, you're dres..."
links.text: "To be perfectly blunt, you're dressed like a bum. And you smell like one, too."

links.title: Perception (Smell): "You have developed a bit of a *rind..."
links.text: You have developed a bit of a *rind* over the past few days.

links.title: Composure: "The lieutenant's right. You're the..."
links.text: The lieutenant's right. You're the acrid sweet smell of decay that makes respectable people wrinkle their noses, the room-evacuating fart...

links.title: You: ""I'm the hobocop, Kim, what do you..."
links.text: "I'm the hobocop, Kim, what do you expect?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs.

links.title: You: ""But the gloves keep my hands warm..."
links.text: "But the gloves keep my hands warm -- look." (Show him the gloves.)

links.title: You: ""That's not quite what I was going..."
links.text: "That's not quite what I was going for."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then maybe you should change your..."
links.text: "Then maybe you should change your look..."

links.title: Composure: "Somehow you thought you were *conce..."
links.text: Somehow you thought you were *concealing* it, but now you know that *everybody* has noticed.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Seeing you on the verge of tears, t..."
links.text: Seeing you on the verge of tears, the lieutenant realizes he was maybe overly direct vis-a-vis your sartorial situation...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's good to see you looking like..."
links.text: "It's good to see you looking like a proud officer of the RCM. It's important for the people of Martinaise to know we're here."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Your half-brother is proud to stand..."
links.text: Your half-brother is proud to stand beside you.

links.title: You: ""Regular cop, regular clothes.""
links.text: "Regular cop, regular clothes."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant regards you for a mo..."
links.text: The lieutenant regards you for a moment, unsure whether you're making a joke or not, and if so, whether he should acknowledge it...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right, detective. You are one regu..."
links.text: "Right, detective. You are one regular cop."

links.title: You: ""You *like* this? I feel like it's..."
links.text: "You *like* this? I feel like it's really cramping my style."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're an officer of the RCM, not..."
links.text: "You're an officer of the RCM, not some *bon vivant*..."

links.title: You: ""Say, why aren't *you* wearing a pi..."
links.text: "Say, why aren't *you* wearing a pig suit?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officers above the rank of sergean..."
links.text: "Officers above the rank of sergeant are granted wide discretion when it comes to their uniforms..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The idea is that civilians are mor..."
links.text: "The idea is that civilians are more likely to open up to someone who's not dressed like a typical cop..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm glad you've finally started dr..."
links.text: "I'm glad you've finally started dressing a little more like an officer of the RCM. Keep it up."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's, well, a little *eclectic*, d..."
links.text: "It's, well, a little *eclectic*, don't you think? How would you even describe what you're wearing?"

links.title: Conceptualization: "'Eclectic' is for pop music with 'i..."
links.text: 'Eclectic' is for pop music with 'indigenous' percussion. *You're* a sartorial maverick.

links.title: You: ""Formal apologetic.""
links.text: "Formal apologetic."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, I can't say it doesn't *fit*..."
links.text: "Well, I can't say it doesn't *fit* you..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Still, you might try *branching ou..."
links.text: "Still, you might try *branching out* a little. You know the expression 'The clothes make the man'? The right outfit, in the right situation, can make all the difference in the world."

links.title: You: ""Hobo chic.""
links.text: "Hobo chic."

links.title: You: ""Superstar Casual." (Click your ton..."
links.text: "Superstar Casual." (Click your tongue.)

links.title: You: ""Regular-core?""
links.text: "Regular-core?"

links.title: You: ""Office Harbinger.""
links.text: "Office Harbinger."

links.title: You: ""They're just clothes, Kim. Who car..."
links.text: "They're just clothes, Kim. Who cares?"
